title: Ya so Yasuo is now a perma ban with the changes to IE
body:
IE
80 Damage
Doubles Your Crit (this counts his passive doubling)
Crits do 20% as True Damage

So with Yasuo you get
{{item:3086}}  (becomes 40% cirt with Yasuo passive)
{{item:3031}}  (becomes 80% stacked with his passive)

He has Conqueror ALL THE TIME.

replies.body: so instead of him having his crits boosted by 50% he's just gonna deal a 20% of his crit as true damage? That's definitely sounds like a nerf but I'll wait for someone to do the numbers.

I dont think you understand.  He has to build one Crit item that is it to get to 100%

30x2x2
No, he has to build a crit item and I.E to get it to 100%, just like he does on live, except he can't get a crit cloak for a quick 100% and instead has to use a full 5400 to get 100%

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2nURc4UU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-01T23:06:31.022+0000)
>
> I dont think you understand.  He has to build one Crit item that is it to get to 100%
> 
> 30x2x2

That doesn't exactly worry me if he is losing a ton of damage for it. Why did you feel the need to re-explain the passive gain like anyone wouldnt get that point from reading the changes yasuo almost always gets 100% crit anyway him doing less damage actually matters.
He already got 100% crit from ie pd, so now he is just losing the bonus 50% damage on crits. Pretty substantial nerf.

This is a nerf to yasuo, he overstacks crit to 120% and loses a huge chunk of damage with the loss of the ie passive. Ie and pd already gave him 100% crit so he is effectively losing the ie passive for no return. Also building just zeal into ie will feel absolutely garbage given the cd on his q will be in the 3 second range.

> Doubles Your Crit (this counts his passive doubling)
> Crits do 20% as True Damage

What the hell is this. More importantly where are you seeing it? Nothing in pbe notes.

Its on the PBE right now.  I was testing it out and its crazy.

You get Zeal then Rush IE

20% phys to true damage CONVERSION < 50% BONUS crit damage 

For a champion that always crits and has reduced crit damage. Not to mention IE + PD combo costs 500 more gold.

Also, you can't lifesteal off of true damage so his in fight sustain is reduced

Geez you guys still don't realize that it literally changes nothing on Yasuo, he has the same crit chance regardless of which patch he's on.

The new items cost more to get to 100% crit.

Well i always ban him anyway..... im not hear to argue with anyone especially yasuo mains who will disagree but his kit just has too much in it. Windwall, shield, knock up, oh and the dash dash dash dash .....and i still dont understand how he can auto you without even being in melee range. At least thats how it seems to me when he autos with 2 minion distance between us.

So? If Riot is worried about it, they can just remove his double crit passive. I think the champion you should be more worried about is Rengar. Stormrazor plus IE anyone? Oh, lets throw Duskblade in there too for shits and giggles.
that's ridiculous.. i already ban yasuo with his double crit rate passive though, i hate crit rate champions because the base crit damage itself is absurdly high..
